body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Mart Solutions. My name is Wayne Lopez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Catherine Miller.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Catherine. Can you please provide your phone number and email address so we can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My phone number is six five five five one two three four and my email is catherine.miller@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that with us. Could you also provide your home address, including the street name, number, city, and postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My address is three one two Park Avenue, Springfield, three three two two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Catherine, for providing your contact information. We will get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Wayne. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Catherine. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
